name: Vacant Skies
description:
A game still being worked on where you are infected with a space fungus and you have to try and get the power back on in your derelict! Explore a 3D environment filled with story tidbits about the life of the crew that vanished mysteriously and start discovering the secrets of what happened!

This was a group project with non-Hexbreak members, so it will always be free!

Still in early Alpha, so a LOT is missing.
